venice.lib.networkIIO

Class IIONamespaceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • venice.lib.networkIIO.IIONamespaceListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.instantreality.InstantIO.Namespace.Listener

    public class IIONamespaceListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.instantreality.InstantIO.Namespace.Listener
    A listener to the InstantIO namespace, to get informed when new slots are created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IIONamespaceListener()
      Creates a namespace listener to listen to the root namespace.

      • outSlotAdded

        public void outSlotAdded(org.instantreality.InstantIO.Namespace namespace,
                java.lang.String label,
                org.instantreality.InstantIO.OutSlot outSlot)
        Gets called by InstantReality, when an outslot is added. Checks if the new outslot is already known. If not, a new inslot is created for it and a new listener is added to that in-slot (IIOInSlotListener).
        Specified by:
        outSlotAdded in interface org.instantreality.InstantIO.Namespace.Listener

      • outSlotRemoved

        public void outSlotRemoved(org.instantreality.InstantIO.Namespace namespace,
                  java.lang.String label,
                  org.instantreality.InstantIO.OutSlot outSlot)
        Gets called by InstantReality, when an outslot is removed from the network. Will remove the inslot that is linked to the removed outslot.
        Specified by:
        outSlotRemoved in interface org.instantreality.InstantIO.Namespace.Listener
        Parameters:
        namespace - from where the outslot was removed
        label - name of the removed outslot
        outSlot - the removed OutSlot object
